subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Architecture
msgSnippet: ... You might wish to go to www.diasparsoftware.com and find the article JUnit: A Starter Guide . It discusses the difference between test cases and test
messageBody:
thecyriuz82 wrote:
>
>
> Hello everybody,
>
> I have a little question because I have to write an article about
> JUnit for my studies.
>
> Now, I found out that the classes "TestCase" and "TestSuite"
> implements the interface "Test".
> My problem is, that I don't really know what this means exactly. I'm
> very new with JUnit.
>
> So I would be very happy, if anybody can give me a short answer to my
> question.
> Thanks a lot to all of you.

You might wish to go to www.diasparsoftware.com and find the article
"JUnit: A Starter Guide". It discusses the difference between test cases
and test suites.
--
